original_text: But the king of Egypt said, “Moses and Aaron, why are you taking the people away from their labor? Get back to your work!”
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 그들에게 이르되 모세와 아론아 너희가 어찌하여 백성의 노역을 쉬게 하려느냐 가서 너희의 노역이나 하라

sentences.original_text: But the king of Egypt said
why are you taking the people away from their labor?
